sentences.english: Ah, it was just one girl of the three witch sisters who loved the man.
sentences.chinese: 啊，三姊妹的一個人的魔女愛上了一個男人。

sentences.english: I know that the witch of the most frightening aspect is lonely.
sentences.chinese: 我知道，魔女最可怕的一面，便是寂寞。

sentences.english: Akik The first movie that you worked on with Brigitte was The Bride with White Hair.
sentences.chinese: 你和林青霞合作的第一部電影是《白髮魔女傳》。

sentences.english: Mermaid addition Witch can also hope that she gave her beautiful voice.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外魔女也希望人魚能把她美妙的聲音送給她。

sentences.english: She was no longer the alternate succubus .
sentences.chinese: 她不再是那個輪番變幻的魔女了。

definition: leech/bloodsucking vermin/vampire (translated European notion)/fig. cruel exploiter, esp. a capitalist exploiting the workers
night demon (malign spirit believed to plague people during sleep)
Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology
fox lady/in folk stories, a beautiful girl who will seduce you then reveal herself as a ghost
Lucifer (Satan's name before his fall in Jewish and Christian mythology)
